Reviews.Title: Fuji sl1000
Reviews.Author: donald wolfson
Reviews.Content: My only dislike relates to the mini tripod legs that do not support the camera.  Other then that, the camera is AWESOME!  Amazons price was very good.  Thank you.  Don  PS: Your best price on a Mac Pro retina 4GB

ProductInfo.Features:
6.2MP 1/2.3" CMOS Sensor Fujinon 50x Optical Zoom Lens
35mm Equivalent Focal Length: 24-1200mm 3.0" 920k-Dot Tilting LCD Monitor
Continuous Shooting: 10fps Equivalent ISO 64-12800
Full HD 1080i Video at 60fps Super Macro Capabilities
Lens Shift Image Stabilization Advanced Filters and SR AUTO Modes
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix SL1000 16.2 Megapixel Digital Camera SL1000 16304630 + 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Carrying Case + HDMI Cable + NP-85 Lithium-Ion Battery Pack (3.7V, 1700mAh) + Compact AC/DC Charger for NP-85 Battery + Memory Wallet + Table Top Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit, LCD Protector + USB SDHC Reader
